sections.title: Argo CD Consulting & Implementation Services
sections.description: Argo CD is a declarative, GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes. Platform engineers and DevOps folks use various techniques to define Kubernetes manifest files such as YAML, Ksonnet, Jsonnet files, Helm charts, and Kustomize. Argo CD application provides the capability to track any type of Kubernetes manifest.
offerings: Our expert ArgoCD consulting team helps in the assessment of the current landscape and helps in architecting the solution for deployments with ArgoCD.
The team of consultants help you deploy and configure ArgoCD for your application deployment and infrastructure configurations.
Configuring the GitOps pattern of using git repositories as the source of truth for defining the desired application state.
InfraCloud’s certified experts define the deployment of desired application state in multiple target environments.
Configuring the single sign-on authentication using OIDC, OAuth2, LDAP, SAML 2.0, etc.
The team of ArgoCD consultants and architects supports you in deploying Argo in High Availability.

sections.title: Achieve GitOps using Argo CD
sections.description: GitOps is a set of DevOps practices that are used to manage infrastructure and application configurations using the Git open source version control system as a 'single source of truth', and is widely used with Kubernetes.
offerings: Our cloud native experts will help you in separating out source code and Kubernetes manifests repos, to enable modifications without affecting each other.
Configure automatic synchronization of application state to the current version of the declarative configuration.
The ArgoCD consultants support you to visualize deployment issues, detect and remediate configuration drift.
As enterprise ArgoCD support, we help you configure Argo CD ensuring that new configurations are correctly deployed to a Kubernetes cluster.

sections.title: Set-up Multi-Tenancy with Argo CD
sections.description: Argo CD has strong support for multiple teams working on different projects in the same Kubernetes environment.
offerings: Our team of Argo CD consultants set up multi-tenancy with Argo CD.
Argo CD CRDs can be restricted to only read source repositories that belong to a certain project and can be set to deploy applications to a specific cluster and namespace.
Each CRD instance can also have its own role-based access control (RBAC) settings.

sections.title: Argo CD Training and Managed Support
sections.description: Training and support from Argo CD experts is a great way to expedite your team’s skills to make the most of your investment with Argo CD.
offerings: Whether you’re looking to deploy or need on-demand ArgoCD commercial support, our engineers provide you with the needed support.
Post implementation training by Argo CD architects and consultants help you build the in-house Argo CD expertise.
